00032   void Amber::verifyFormat(std::istream& is, const std::string fmt) {
00033 
00034     std::string str;
00035     is >> str;
00036   
00037     boost::char_separator<char> sep("()");
00038     tokenizer tokens(str, sep);
00039     tokenizer::iterator toks = tokens.begin();
00040 
00041     ++toks;
00042     if (*toks != fmt)
00043       throw(std::runtime_error("Bad format spec"));
00044 
00045   }
00046 
00047 
00048   void Amber::parseCharges(std::istream& is) {
00049     verifyFormat(is, "5E16.8");
00050 
00051     uint n = atoms.size();
00052     greal m;
00053 
00054     for (uint i=0; i<n; i++) {
00055       if (! (is >> std::setw(16) >> m)) {
00056         if (is.fail())
00057           throw(std::runtime_error("IO error while reading amber charges"));
00058         else
00059           throw(std::runtime_error("Invalid conversion while reading amber charges"));
00060       }
00061       atoms[i]->charge(m);
00062     }
00063   }
00064

00067   void Amber::parseMasses(std::istream& is) {
00068     verifyFormat(is, "5E16.8");
00069 
00070     uint n = atoms.size();
00071     greal m;
00072 
00073     for (uint i=0; i<n; i++) {
00074       if (! (is >> std::setw(16) >> m)) {
00075         if (is.fail())
00076           throw(std::runtime_error("IO error while reading amber masses"));
00077         else
00078           throw(std::runtime_error("Invalid conversion while reading amber masses"));
00079       }
00080       atoms[i]->mass(m);
00081     }
00082   }

00086   void Amber::parseResidueLabels(std::istream& is) {
00087     verifyFormat(is, "20a4");
00088 
00089     for (uint i=0; i<nres; i++) {
00090       std::string s;
00091       if (!(is >> std::setw(4) >> s)) {
00092         if (is.fail())
00093           throw(std::runtime_error("IO error while reading residue labels"));
00094         else
00095           throw(std::runtime_error("Invalid conversion while reading residue labels"));
00096       }
00097       residue_labels.push_back(s);
00098     }
00099   }
00100 
00101 
00102   void Amber::parseResiduePointers(std::istream& is) {
00103     verifyFormat(is, "10I8");
00104 
00105     for (uint i=0; i<nres; i++) {
00106       int j;
00107       if (!(is >> std::setw(8) >> j)) {
00108         if (is.fail())
00109           throw(std::runtime_error("IO error while reading residue pointers"));
00110         else
00111           throw(std::runtime_error("Invalid conversion while reading residue pointers"));
00112       }
00113       residue_pointers.push_back(j);
00114     }
00115   }
00116 
00117 
00118   void Amber::assignResidues(void) {
00119     if (!(residue_pointers.size() == nres && residue_labels.size() == nres))
00120       throw(std::runtime_error("Unable to assign residues."));
00121 
00122     int curresid = 0;
00123     uint i = 0;
00124     std::string curresname;
00125 
00126     for (i=0; i<nres-1; i++) {
00127       ++curresid;
00128       curresname = residue_labels[i];
00129       for (uint j = residue_pointers[i]; j<residue_pointers[i+1]; j++) {
00130         atoms[j-1]->resid(curresid);
00131         atoms[j-1]->resname(curresname);
00132       }
00133     }
00134 
00135     // Fix the end...
00136     ++curresid;
00137     curresname = residue_labels[i];
00138     for (uint j = residue_pointers[i]-1; j<natoms; j++) {
00139       atoms[j]->resid(curresid);
00140       atoms[j]->resname(curresname);
00141     }
00142   }

00145 
00146   void Amber::parseBonds(std::istream& is, const int n) {
00147     verifyFormat(is, "10I8");
00148 
00149     int i, a, b, k;
00150 
00151     for (i=0; i<n; i++) {
00152       if (!(is >> a >> b >> k)) {
00153         if (is.fail())
00154           throw(std::runtime_error("IO error while reading bonds"));
00155         else
00156           throw(std::runtime_error("Invalid conversion while reading bonds"));
00157       }
00158 
00159       pAtom aatom = atoms[a/3];
00160       pAtom batom = atoms[b/3];
00161 
00162       // Amber bond lists are not symmetric, so make sure we add both pairs...
00163       if (!(aatom->isBoundTo(batom)))
00164         aatom->addBond(batom);
00165       if (!(batom->isBoundTo(aatom)))
00166         batom->addBond(aatom);
00167     }
00168   }
00169 
00170 
00171   void Amber::parsePointers(std::istream& is) {
00172     verifyFormat(is, "10I8");
00173     uint dummy;
00174 
00175     is >> natoms;
00176     is >> dummy;
00177     is >> nbonh;
00178     is >> mbona;
00179     for (int i=0; i<7; i++)
00180       is >> dummy;
00181     is >> nres;
00182 
00183     for (int i=0; i<19; i++)
00184       is >> dummy;
00185 
00186     // Now build up the atomic-group...
00187     if (atoms.size() != 0)
00188       throw(std::logic_error("Internal error: trying to read in an amber parmtop into a non-empty group!"));
00189 
00190     for (uint i=0; i<natoms; i++) {
00191       pAtom pa(new Atom);
00192       pa->id(i+1);
00193       atoms.push_back(pa);
00194     }
00195 
00196   }

00199   // Simply slurp up the title (for now)
00200   void Amber::parseTitle(std::istream& is) {
00201     verifyFormat(is, "20a4");
00202     char buf[1024];
00203   
00204     is.getline(buf, 1024);
00205   }

00208   void Amber::parseAtomNames(std::istream& is) {
00209     verifyFormat(is, "20a4");
00210 
00211     for (uint i=0; i<natoms; i++) {
00212       std::string s;
00213       is >> std::setw(4) >> s;
00214       atoms[i]->name(s);
00215     }
00216 
00217     if (is.fail())
00218       throw(std::runtime_error("IO error while reading atom names"));
00219   }
00220 
00221 
00222   void Amber::read(std::istream& is) {
00223     char buf[1024];
00224 
00225     is.getline(buf,1024);
00226   
00227     bool flag = false;
00228     std::string s;
00229     is >> s;
00230 
00231 
00232     while (!(is.eof() || is.fail())) {
00233       if (s != "%FLAG")
00234         throw(std::runtime_error("Parse error: " + s));
00235 
00236       is >> s;
00237       if (s == "TITLE")
00238         parseTitle(is);
00239       else if (s == "POINTERS")
00240         parsePointers(is);
00241       else if (s == "ATOM_NAME")
00242         parseAtomNames(is);
00243       else if (s == "CHARGE")
00244         parseCharges(is);
00245       else if (s == "MASS")
00246         parseMasses(is);
00247       else if (s == "RESIDUE_LABEL")
00248         parseResidueLabels(is);
00249       else if (s == "RESIDUE_POINTER")
00250         parseResiduePointers(is);
00251       else if (s == "BONDS_INC_HYDROGEN")
00252         parseBonds(is, nbonh);
00253       else if (s == "BONDS_WITHOUT_HYDROGEN")
00254         parseBonds(is, mbona);
00255       else {
00256         while (is >> s)
00257           if (s == "%FLAG")
00258             break;
00259         flag = true;
00260       }
00261 
00262       if (!flag)
00263         is >> s;
00264       else
00265         flag = false;
00266     
00267     }
00268 
00269     assignResidues();
00270   }
